name: Lava Lab
description:
Get to the end of the level before the lava beats you to it!

Controls

- WASD and space to move and jump

- Mouse to look around

- Additional controls listed in-game

- Get to the blue light at the end of every level!

This game was intended to be an entry for the Raylib 5K Gamejam, but being unable to meet the requirements quickly enough, it is not going to be submitted.

Have fun!

(Still in development, more levels/features/bug fixes may be added in the feature)

THANK YOU TO
